Detailed Description

Reconstruction of one slice on the reconstruct-as-acquired approach.

Author:
antonmx <antonmx@gmail.com>
Date:
Mon Jul 21 10:09:31 2008

Main file for the program which reconstructs one slice from the set of images as they are ready to read.

Definition in file ct-line.cpp.

Function Documentation

static int getLine ( Line &  sinoline,
float &  Theta 
) [static]

Parses the input string.

Reads the projection angle and the name of the image file from the stdin, then puts the line from the projection read from image into the ::sinoline and the angle of the projection into ::Theta.

Parameters:
sinolineline storage
Thetaprojection angle
Returns:
0 if this is the end of input, non-zero otherwise
